comments.author: Alexander Klimetschek
comments.body: Unit test for this problem, based on https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12368670/CheckoutFailure.java

comments.author: Alexander Klimetschek
comments.body: Replaced unit test patch with one that includes the Apache license header.

comments.author: Alexander Klimetschek
comments.body: Created a separate issue for the unit test at JCR-1420 and moved the patch over there. Separates actual patch and test code for discussion, problems and release note entries.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
The test case is better handled as an integral part of this issue.

Applied the product patch in revision 631257 and the test case from JCR-1420 in revision 631261.

Resolving as Fixed. Thanks!

PS. I didn't change the formatting to avoid messing with your checkout, but going forward, could you please only use spaces instead of tabs for indentation.

description: Backport issue JCR-1197 (Node.restore() may throw InvalidItemStateException) to 1.3 branch for 1.3.4 (separate issue to avoid re-opening JCR-1197 which was already released with 1.4).
summary: Backport JCR-1197: Node.restore() may throw InvalidItemStateException
